name: f5-cloud-libs
description: Common library code for deploying a BIG-IP in a cloud environment

scripts.test: node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter eclipse test/lib; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit 1; fi; node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter eclipse test/scripts; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit 1; fi
